attributes.action: Give the people of Britain the streets back
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We want no hooded gangs, no knives or guns. We want the streets made safer for us law abiding citizens. We want to be able to go out without fear of being attacked for no reason.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
